tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Navina has been our trusted pediatrician for the past two years and we couldn't be happier. A friend recommended her, and she was perfect. Taking our daughter to the pediatrician is always challenging, but Dr. Navina goes out of her way to ensure my daughter feels comfortable during each visit. She is simply amazing!

I wanted to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care and support you have provided to my daughter over the past 10 months. Your dedication, expertise, and kindness have made a significant difference in her well-being and our family's peace of mind.

Your unwavering commitment to ensuring her health and development has been truly remarkable. Your patience in answering our questions, your gentle approach with her, and your genuine concern for her welfare have not gone unnoticed. Your professionalism and empathy have made every visit a positive experience.

We are so grateful to have you as our daughter's pediatrician. Your guidance has been invaluable, and we appreciate everything you do to keep her healthy and happy. Thank you for going above and beyond in your care for her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Navina is really good with kids. I have been taking my little one since a long time and she has been patient and gentle with the child. She listened to all my queries with patience and attended to it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We feel so fortunate to have found such a wonderful pediatrician and highly recommend Dr. Navina Desai to other parents seeking a friendly and caring paediatrician. *** ** *** *****

Our preterm baby was in NICU for 14 days. She took care of everything very well. She takes care of our baby since birth and we feel it is our luck that we are in the best hand. She understands the problem and explains it so simply that any parents could easily get it. Her communication is good & clear and it makes her stand out. She allot enough time to make things clear at every follow up, never in hurry, highly responsible. *****we highly recommend her*****

Dr navina desai is an awesome doc. She always there for my kids.  last year my son is having high fever at night and doesn't come down my whole family was very tensed but Dr Desai awake whole night with the us to handle the whole situation on phone. At present also she always available and gives proper treatment and knows how to handle babies and also child. 
I really really thankful to mam. 
I recommend everyone to go to the mam for treatment and vaccinations both.

Very gentle and kind Doctor. It's nice that she hears all the problem very patiently, just the way how kids want and in whatever way they can be comfortable. It's really tricky to work with kids mood and henceforth she has mastered the psychology of a kid to understand them mentally as well as physically.

********* ** **** ***** *********** She  is taking good care of my twin babies since birth, my babies are of 1 year   now and we r continuing their vaccination with Dr Navina as well. She gives important parenting tips also, which I like. Her best thing is she responds on what's app on any query. *** ** **** **** * ****** * ************** I m grateful to her .Thanks for being there. 
I always recommend to everyone.
I have been consulting Dr. Navina for my child since birth. She is extremely good, patient and always replies to your messages in case if you have any doubt about the medicine. Highly recommended.
She is very well versed in her subject and patient care is handled with best knowledge and empathy that is required . Her approach toward kids is very calm and meticulous . I would recommend her
